SoftwareType.Name: Internet Connection
SoftwareType.Description: Use this to connect your Computer/Mobile Device to the internet

Category.Name: Network
Category.Description: If you want to connect to the internet, this might be an important category.

Feature.Name: Wired Router
Feature.Description: Connection to the internet has never been easier! Just plug in the cord and youre ready to go.

Feature.Name: Wireless Router
Feature.Description: Now with this, you can take away that ugly router connected to your computer. (And the ugly dust shadow around it.)
